About

FullStack Web Developer

BIO

Hi, Iâ€™m Jack. Nice to meet you. I'm a FullStack Web Developer from Cork, Ireland proficient in technologies such as Ruby, Ruby on Rails, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL and Git.

After studying a masters in law and aiming to become a lawyer, I realized I was not passionate enough to continue a career in law. Then I worked in a finance company for two years. However, long story short neither a career in law or finance made me happy so I decided to seek an alternative career path. I wanted a career path that would be intellectually challenging, rewarding and ever-changing, so I decided to learn to code and change careers.

In summer 2018, I attended Le Wagon, a 9-week intensive coding bootcamp learning HTML5, CSS 3, Bootstrap, JavaScript(ES6), SQL, git, GitHub, Figma, Heroku, Ruby and Ruby on Rails. Designed, implemented and shipped to production a clone of AirBnB and a Ruby on Rails prototype.
